comment: Funny guy, has great facts about each topic. He knows what he is talking about and clearly has a great interest in what he teaches. A few very short papers are given during the course. HUGE curve on tests. Overall a great guy and would love to see him become a full time teacher here at KSU. Don't stress out during the tests, show up, take notes.

This man really knows his history, rarely relies on the powerpoint. His lectures are a bit boring at times because a lot of the information is... well from a powerpoint. However, you do the study guides and put in effort into the papers he asks from you and you should end up with an A. He is an amazing professor and very understanding.

This is a lecture-based class, but Dr. MacMaster makes it interesting. He puts all of his presentations online, but you still need to to come and pay attention to every lecture. There's a lot of information, and if you aren't willing to pay 100% attention you will be confused, and it will be your fault. Detailed, clear study guides for exams.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Good teacher with good lectures. Take notes so you understand and study for the tests, but if you study you can get easy A's. Tries to make  lectures more fun, would definitely take him again.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor MacMaster is not out to fail anyone unless that is your goal for taking this class. Seriously as long as you put some kind of effort into the class you can easily come out with at least a B. He is a very lenient grader on the papers he assigns and he is easy to talk to if you have questions.

rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Very nice guy. Very chill and does not grade hard. Most of your grade comes from papers and as long as you know what your writing about you will be fine. also gives a lot of chances for extra credit

Great guy. He really knows his stuff and makes his lectures interesting by telling fun facts about whatever the topic is. You have papers, but he is not a tough grader. He is really chill, polite, and LOVES class participation. This is an easy A; you just have to put the work in.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: This man is incredible. It would be a bad idea not to take him. He really makes an effort to make things interesting by sprinkling some  very dry and hilarious humor here and there, and I can tell he knows his stuff. He makes it easy to get an A, and is a very lenient grader over all. If you want a chill class and professor, take this class.

Professor MacMaster is extremely sweet and actually takes the time to get to know his students. He does everything in his power to make sure most people get A's in his class. He is extremely passionate about the material and you can see that in the way he teaches.

Dr. McMaster is the most interesting teacher I've taken.  He brings a lot of material and knowledge and really seems to care about the subject.  The class isn't hard but it is almost always worth attending.  It's the only class I've taken at Kennesaw that I never want to miss.

MacMaster is a wonderful professor who really makes it easy to pass. Honestly, you have 3-4 papers and if you barely understand what you're writing about, you'll make an A. This man really wants you to pass. He offers several chances for extra credit, so no need to worry about that. If you want a class you don't have to worry about, take this one.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: Easiest class you could take. 3 essays. Easy grader. curves midterm and final

Professor MacMaster is such a great teacher!! He doesn't go out of his way to make the class unusually difficult and he actually cares that his students pass. He assigns easy take home quizzes, and writing assignments that he doesn't harshly grade and he gives study guides for tests. I would love to take him again! Best teacher at Kennesaw State!

Dr MacMaster is the best professor Ive ever had. Obviously cares deeply about his teaching and his students. He makes sure everyone can get an A if they want it. He even told my class "You have to try to not make an A". Has a handful of really easy tests papers and quizzes (Which he grades on a generous curve). Just use quizlet and you'll be golden
Pretty easy. Take home quizzes. Multiple choice tests. A few writing assignments. Gives interesting lectures.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Probably the most knowledgeable professor I have had at KSU.
Really seems to care alot about the subject.  Makes efforts to know who students are.
